msbt.message: Hello, .<10_4 /> This is where I take on important requests related to save data.The requests I accept here are very serious ones, so children should get help from a parent or guardian.
Hello, .<10_4 /> This is where I take on important requests related to settings.The requests I accept here are very serious ones, so children should get help from a parent or guardian.
Now, with that said
And that should cover everything.<10_4 /> Yes, yes, as I said before
I can help you with a few things now. What will it be?
Delete resident registration.
Listen to explanation.
I'm done talking.
Now, with that said, how can I help you?
Delete resident registration.
Listen to explanation.
I'm done talking.
Now, what settings would you like to talk about today?
Save data settings.
NookLink settings.
Nothing right now.
Save data settings, hm? Of course! Of course!
Yes, yes, I understand!<10_4 /> In that case, let's return you to the title screen.I hope you continue to enjoy life on !
Yes, yes, we don't need to do anything right now.<10_4 /> In that case, let's return you to the title screen.I hope you continue to enjoy life on !
Well, I do hope we will meet again someday, somewhere.
Now, let's return to the title screen.<10_4 /> See you on !
I'm relieved to hear that!<10_4 /> In that case, let's get you back to the title screen, hm?I hope you continue enjoying life on !
Yes, yes, I can explain things, but it may take a little bit of time.It's all very important information, so do listen carefully before making any decisions.

Here, residents like you can see me about deleting their resident registration.In other words, I'm talking about deleting your player save data for Animal Crossing: New Horizons.You can't delete just the save data for a player from System Settings on the Nintendo Switch HOME Menu.So, if you want to delete information about you living on this island, please talk to me here instead.

Now, allow me to explain in more detail what it means to delete your resident registrationIf deleted, all memories of you and your property on will be erased.This includes your home, money, and miles. But you'll also be erased from my and other residents' memories.
So, I strongly suggest that you only proceed with this drastic step when it's absolutely necessary.

I should give you some information about deleting resident registrationsIf deleted, all memory and property of on will be erased.This includes their home, money, and miles. But they'll also be erased from my and other residents' memories.Since their data is not tied to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system, they can't play on the island.However, if someone used a user account not tied to a resident registrationthey could opt to play as .

Usually, residents like you can chat with me here about deleting resident registrations.In other words, I'm talking about deleting player save data for Animal Crossing: New Horizons.You can't delete only one player's save data from System Settings on the Nintendo Switch HOME Menu.So, if you want to delete information about a player living on this island, please talk to me here instead.

Now, allow me to explain in more detail what it means to delete a player's resident registrationIf deleted, all memories of them and their property on will be erased.This includes their home, money, and miles. But they'll also be erased from my and other residents' memories.

However, Your situation is different.You play a very important role on as the Resident Representative.You and this island are a set would no longer be able to function properly if you were to leave us.That's why I cannot accept any requests from you here to delete your own resident registration.

If you insist on deleting your data, , since you are the Resident Representativeyour only option is to delete all save data for the game!To do this, go to the Nintendo Switch HOME Menu and select System Settings.Once there, select Data Management, then look for Delete Save Data.Select Animal Crossing: New Horizons. After that, choose Delete All Save Data for This Software.You should know, though, that this method can't be used to just delete a single player's save data.Again, it will delete all save data for the game. That is, it'll delete the entire island of !

If you insist on deleting the Resident Representative's datayour only option is to delete all save data for the game!To do this, go to the Nintendo Switch HOME Menu and select System Settings.Once there, select Data Management, then look for Delete Save Data.Select Animal Crossing: New Horizons. After that, choose Delete All Save Data for This Software.You should know, though, that this method can't be used to just delete a single player's save data.Again, it will delete all save data for the game. That is, it'll delete the entire island of !
Hm, so you'd like to delete someone's resident registration.
So, I strongly suggest carrying out this process only when it is absolutely necessary., do you still want to delete your resident registration?
I don't want to do that.
Delete resident registration.
Now, there is currently a resident on not tied to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.
Now, there are currently residents on not tied to user accounts on this Nintendo Switch system.
, are you thinking about deleting your own resident registration or someone else's?
Delete my own data.
Delete another's data.
I don't want to do that.
In that case, here is the resident currently not tied to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.
In that case, here are the residents not tied to any user account on this Nintendo Switch system.
In that case, excluding the Resident Representativehere is the resident currently not tied to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.
In that case, excluding the Resident Representativehere are the residents currently not tied to any user account on this Nintendo Switch system.
So, you are considering deleting 's data.

So, if 's resident registration is deleted, you'll never be able to do that in the future.I strongly suggest doing this process only when it's absolutely necessary.Do you still want to delete 's resident registration?
I don't want to do that.
Delete resident registration.

Right now, there is one resident on who is not linked with a Nintendo Switch user account.However, that resident is the island's Resident Representative, so their data can't be deleted.That means, at the moment, the only resident registration I can delete is your own, . What would you like to do?
Delete my own data.
Delete Resident Rep.?
I don't want to do that.

Right now, there are residents on not linked with Nintendo Switch user accounts. However, one of those residents is the island's Resident Representative.There'd be all sorts of trouble if I deleted their resident registration, so I can't accept that request here.Now thenwhose resident registration are you thinking of deleting?
Delete my own data.
Delete another's data.
Delete Resident Rep.?
I don't want to do that.
You want to delete a resident? Yes, yes, I can help with that.However, , you are the Resident Representative, and things would be tricky without you.
As such, there's nothing I can do for you here, .
I understand.
How do I delete my data?
So, as I mentioned before, there's nothing I can do for you here, .
I understand.
Explain that again.
For other residents, as a general rule, I need to meet with them if they want to delete their registration.
Now, there is currently a resident on not tied to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.
Now, there are currently residents on not tied to user accounts on this Nintendo Switch system.
I can accept requests to delete the resident data in this case. What would you like to do, hm?
Delete another's data.
I don't want to do that.
